capabilityDescription.en: Writes the content of the incoming FlowFiles to the configured Azure Queue Storage.
capabilityDescription.zh: 将传入FlowFiles的内容写入配置的Azure队列存储。

en.description: Storage accounts in public Azure always use a common FQDN suffix. Override this endpoint suffix with a different suffix in certain circumstances (like Azure Stack or non-public Azure regions).

zh.description: 公共Azure中的存储帐户始终使用公共FQDN后缀。在某些情况下（如Azure Stack或非公共Azure区域），使用不同的后缀覆盖此端点后缀。

en.description: The length of time during which the message will be invisible after it is read. If the processing unit fails to delete the message after it is read, then the message will reappear in the queue.

zh.description: The length of time during which the message will be invisible after it is read. If the processing unit fails to delete the message after it is read, then the message will reappear in the queue.

en.description: The timeout for read or write requests to Azure Queue Storage. Defaults to 1 second.

zh.description: The timeout for read or write requests to Azure Queue Storage. Defaults to 1 second.

en.description: Specifies the Proxy Configuration Controller Service to proxy network requests. Supported proxies: SOCKS, HTTP In case of SOCKS, it is not guaranteed that the selected SOCKS Version will be used by the processor.

zh.description: 指定代理配置控制器服务以代理网络请求。支持的代理：SOCKS、HTTP如果是SOCKS，则不保证处理器将使用所选的SOCKS版本。

en.description: Controller Service used to obtain Azure Storage Credentials.

zh.description: Controller Service used to obtain Azure Storage Credentials.

en.description: Maximum time to allow the message to be in the queue

zh.description: Maximum time to allow the message to be in the queue

en.description: Name of the Azure Storage Queue

failure.en: Unsuccessful operations will be transferred to the failure relationship.
failure.zh: 未成功的操作将转移到失败关系。

success.en: All successfully processed FlowFiles are routed to this relationship
success.zh: 所有成功处理的FlowFiles都将路由到此关系
